headline: Is 3M a Top Stock to Buy for 2025?
summary: After years of underperformance, 3M (NYSE: MMM) stock delivered a respectable performance to investors in 2024 -- gaining some 17%.  No one, least of all CEO Bill Brown, believes 3M is a quick-fix situation.  Before going into detail, it's worth noting that 3M has an investor day planned for Feb. 26, during which Brown will discuss 3M's plans and guidance in more detail.
